title: Spicy Coconut Gunpowder/ Kobbari karam
content:
Ingredients: Dry coconut powder - 1 cup Dry red chillies - 3 Red chili powder - 1/2 tb sp Garlic cloves - 3 Tamarind paste - 1 tea spoon Jaggery powder - 1 tea spoon Salt - 1 tea spoon Oil - 1 tb sp For Tempering: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • First take a tempering pan add oil, mustard seeds, Cumin seeds, Urad dal and Bengal gram stir till the color changes and splutter. Now add curry leaves and fried ground nuts and keep this aside
  • Now add dry red chillies, red chili powder, garlic cloves, salt, tamarind paste, jaggery powder in mixer grinder and make it smooth powder
  • In the same mixer grinder add dry coconut powder blend it well till coarse powder
  • Take out it into a bowl add tempering and mix well
  • Serve it with any kind of dry vegetable fries
  • You can add this Spicy Coconut Gunpowder/ Kobbari Karam to any fried curriesÂ Ivy Gourd fry/ Dondakaya fry/ Tindora fry
